actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendments, S. Rept. 94-1366.

official_title: A resolution providing for the installation and use of electronic voting equipment in the Senate Chamber.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendments, S. Rept. 94-1366) Directs the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration to provide for the installation of an electronic voting system in the Senate Chamber. Provides that expenses thereby incurred shall be paid from the Senate's contingent fund.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the installation and use of electronic voting equipment in the Senate Chamber.
